commit message: Added Scheduler interface with implementations using executor service and alarmmanager

Corrections for the send debug logs feature

Only export selected columns (excel, csv, html, kml)
Added options to select all or select none, in the list of columns
Adding icons for the screen to select colummns to monitor
Minor improvement of the screen to select fields to monitor
Fix bug in KML export
Updating Spanish and French translations
Adding javadoc
Ran UCDetector and Lint
Cleanining up preference strings
Use ExecutorService by default

Merge branch 'debuglogs' of https://github.com/BoD/network-monitor
